20110101010021.000|20110101010024.000|CC1|>>> TONIGHT, SHOCKING 911 CALLS 
20110101010024.000|20110101010025.000|CC1|CAUGHT ON TAPE.                 
20110101010025.000|20110101010027.000|CC1|THEY ARE MADE IN THE HEAT OF THE
20110101010027.000|20110101010028.000|CC1|MOMENT, A CRIME JUST TAKES      
20110101010028.000|20110101010029.000|CC1|PLACE.                          
20110101010029.000|20110101010030.000|CC1|A CHILD DISCOVERED MISSING.     
20110101010030.000|20110101010033.000|CC1|BUT 911 CALLS SERVE ANOTHER     
20110101010033.000|20110101010034.000|CC1|PURPOSE, OTHER THAN JUST        
20110101010034.000|20110101010035.000|CC1|ALERTING AUTHORITIES.           
20110101010035.000|20110101010038.000|CC1|THE 911 CALLS THEMSELVES TURN   
20110101010038.000|20110101010040.000|CC1|OUT TO BE CRITICAL INVESTIGATIVE
20110101010040.000|20110101010042.000|CC1|TOOLS IN SOLVING CRIMES.        
20110101010042.000|20110101010044.000|CC1|TONIGHT, CHILLING 911 CALLS FROM
20110101010044.000|20110101010057.000|CC1|ALL ACROSS THE COUNTRY.         
20110101010057.000|20110101010059.000|CC1|>> WE START IN FLORIDA.         
20110101010059.000|20110101010101.000|CC1|A 5-YEAR-OLD GIRL TUCKED INTO   
20110101010101.000|20110101010103.000|CC1|BED, FIVE HOURS LATER, SHE'S    
20110101010103.000|20110101010103.000|CC1|GONE.                           
20110101010103.000|20110101010105.000|CC1|DADDY COMES HOME FROM THE NIGHT 
20110101010105.000|20110101010108.000|CC1|SHIFT TO FIND NOT A TRACE OF    
20110101010108.000|20110101010109.000|CC1|LITTLE HAYLEY.                  
20110101010109.000|20110101010110.000|CC1|LAST PERSON TO SEE HER ALIVE,   
20110101010110.000|20110101010114.000|CC1|THE BABYSITTER/STEPMOTHER, MISTY
20110101010114.000|20110101010116.000|CC1|CROSLIN BUT CROSLIN WAITS TO    
20110101010116.000|20110101010116.000|CC1|CALL 911.                       
20110101010116.000|20110101010540.000|CC1|WHY?                            
20110101010540.000|20110101010541.000|CC1|>> RIGHT NOW THE FATHER OF      
20110101010541.000|20110101010543.000|CC1|LITTLE HALEIGH, RONALD CUMMINGS,
20110101010543.000|20110101010545.000|CC1|IS WITH US.                     
20110101010545.000|20110101010546.000|CC1|MR. CUMMINGS, YOU AND YOUR      
20110101010546.000|20110101010548.000|CC1|FAMILY ARE IN SO MANY PRAYERS   
20110101010548.000|20110101010552.000|CC1|ACROSS THE COUNTRY RIGHT NOW.   
20110101010552.000|20110101010552.000|CC1|PLEASE TELL US WHAT HAPPENED    
20110101010552.000|20110101010554.000|CC1|WHEN YOU GOT HOME FROM WORK THAT
20110101010554.000|20110101010555.000|CC1|NIGHT, I BELIEVE IT WAS AROUND  
20110101010555.000|20110101010558.000|CC1|3:00 A.M.                       
20110101010558.000|20110101010602.000|CC1|>> ACTUALLY, IT WAS ABOUT 3:25, 
20110101010602.000|20110101010602.000|CC1|3:27 --                         
20110101010602.000|20110101010605.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20110101010605.000|20110101010607.000|CC1|>> I PULLED INTO THE YARD AND MY
20110101010607.000|20110101010609.000|CC1|GIRLFRIEND OPENED THE FRONT     
20110101010609.000|20110101010611.000|CC1|DOOR, AND I ALREADY KNEW        
20110101010611.000|20110101010613.000|CC1|SOMETHING WAS WRONG BECAUSE     
20110101010613.000|20110101010615.000|CC1|SHE'S NOT UP AT THIS TIME.      
20110101010615.000|20110101010617.000|CC1|SHE TOLD ME, I SAID TO HER WHAT 
20110101010617.000|20110101010619.000|CC1|ARE YOU DOING UP AT THIS TIME.  
20110101010619.000|20110101010620.000|CC1|SHE SAID YOUR BACK DOOR IS WIDE 
20110101010620.000|20110101010624.000|CC1|OPEN AND YOUR DAUGHTER'S GONE.  
20110101010624.000|20110101010628.000|CC1|>> WHAT IS HER DESCRIPTION, WHAT
20110101010628.000|20110101010632.000|CC1|SCENARIO TOOK PLACE?            
20110101010632.000|20110101010635.000|CC1|>> SHE GOT OUT OF THE BED AND   
20110101010635.000|20110101010638.000|CC1|WENT TO USE THE RESTROOM AND    
20110101010638.000|20110101010641.000|CC1|CAME BACK TO FIND OUT MY        
20110101010641.000|20110101010642.000|CC1|DAUGHTER WAS NOT IN BED WITH    
20110101010642.000|20110101010643.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110101010643.000|20110101010644.000|CC1|AND THE BACK DOOR WAS WIDE OPEN 
20110101010644.000|20110101010647.000|CC1|AND SHE WAS GONE.               
20110101010647.000|20110101010649.000|CC1|>> RONALD, WHAT TIME DID SHE PUT
20110101010649.000|20110101010655.000|CC1|HALEIGH TO BED?                 
20110101010655.000|20110101010656.000|CC1|>> SHE PUTS THEM TO BED EVERY   
20110101010656.000|20110101010657.000|CC1|NIGHT AT 8:00.                  
20110101010657.000|20110101010658.000|CC1|>> 8:00.                        
20110101010658.000|20110101010659.000|CC1|WHEN SHE PUT --                 
20110101010659.000|20110101010700.000|CC1|>> AND --                       
20110101010700.000|20110101010702.000|CC1|>> WHEN SHE PUT HER TO BED AT   
20110101010702.000|20110101010703.000|CC1|8:00, DID SHE ALSO PUT TO BED   
20110101010703.000|20110101010706.000|CC1|THE LITTLE 4-YEAR-OLD BOY?      
20110101010706.000|20110101010707.000|CC1|>> YES, SHE DID.                
20110101010707.000|20110101010708.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20110101010708.000|20110101010712.000|CC1|WHAT TIME DID SHE GO TO BED?    
20110101010712.000|20110101010714.000|CC1|>> APPROXIMATELY 10:30, 11:00.  
20110101010714.000|20110101010717.000|CC1|>> 10:30, 11:00.

20110101010722.000|20110101010723.000|CC1|>> AND THEY ALL SLEPT TOGETHER  
20110101010723.000|20110101010725.000|CC1|IN THE SAME BED, CORRECT?       
20110101010725.000|20110101010729.000|CC1|>> YES.

20110101010732.000|20110101010736.000|CC1|P.M. AND 3:30 A.M., HALEIGH GOES
20110101010736.000|20110101010737.000|CC1|MISSING.                        
20110101010737.000|20110101010741.000|CC1|NOW, DID SHE CALL 911?

20110101010745.000|20110101010747.000|CC1|SHE TRIED TO CALL ME BUT I WAS  
20110101010747.000|20110101010749.000|CC1|PULLING IN THE DRIVEWAY, SO I

20110101011200.000|20110101011201.000|CC1|>>> I JUST KILLED MY CHILDREN.  
20110101011201.000|20110101011203.000|CC1|SHE SAYS IT TO A 911 DISPATCH   
20110101011203.000|20110101011205.000|CC1|LIKE SHE'S ORDERING FRIES AT A  
20110101011205.000|20110101011207.000|CC1|McDONALD'S DRIVE-THROUGH.       
20110101011207.000|20110101011209.000|CC1|WORDS THAT SEND A CHILL DOWN    
20110101011209.000|20110101011210.000|CC1|YOUR SPINE.                     
20110101011210.000|20110101011211.000|CC1|CALMLY, INTENTIONALLY SPOKEN    
20110101011211.000|20110101011214.000|CC1|WORDS BY A MOM OF TWO.          
20110101011214.000|20110101011215.000|CC1|AS POLICE RACE TO ONE OF THE    
20110101011215.000|20110101011218.000|CC1|MOST DISTURBING SCENES THEY EVER
20110101011218.000|20110101011219.000|CC1|HAVE ENCOUNTERED.               
20110101011219.000|20110101011221.000|CC1|ONE CHILD STILL ALIVE, HANGING  
20110101011221.000|20110101011226.000|CC1|ON TO LIFE BY A THREAD.         
20110101011226.000|20110101011228.000|CC1|DEBORAH JENELLE JETER STAYS ON  
20110101011228.000|20110101011916.000|CC1|THE LINE WITH 911.              
20110101011916.000|20110101011919.000|CC1|>> MICHAEL, THE 911 CALL IS SO  
20110101011919.000|20110101011921.000|CC1|DISTURBING, SO UPSETTING, THE   
20110101011921.000|20110101011923.000|CC1|WAY SHE TOSSES OFF THE WORDS "I 
20110101011923.000|20110101011926.000|CC1|KILLED MY CHILDREN."            
20110101011926.000|20110101011929.000|CC1|SHE'S PERFECTLY COMPLETELY IN   
20110101011929.000|20110101011930.000|CC1|CONTROL AND I UNDERSTAND HER    
20110101011930.000|20110101011933.000|CC1|ATTACK ON HER TWO GIRLS, SHE WAS
20110101011933.000|20110101011934.000|CC1|ANGRY BECAUSE THE HUSBAND FILED 
20110101011934.000|20110101011935.000|CC1|FOR DIVORCE?                    
20110101011935.000|20110101011936.000|CC1|>> NANCY, WHAT'S AMAZING ABOUT  
20110101011936.000|20110101011940.000|CC1|THIS CASE IS THIS IS A WOMAN    
20110101011940.000|20110101011942.000|CC1|WITH BORDERLINE PERSONALITY     
20110101011942.000|20110101011942.000|CC1|DISORDER.                       
20110101011942.000|20110101011943.000|CC1|SHE'S BEEN --                   
20110101011943.000|20110101011944.000|CC1|>> DID YOU SAY BORDERLINE?      
20110101011944.000|20110101011945.000|CC1|>> BORDERLINE PERSONALITY       
20110101011945.000|20110101011946.000|CC1|DISORDER.                       
20110101011946.000|20110101011949.000|CC1|>> DON'T START WITH ME ABOUT    
20110101011949.000|20110101011952.000|CC1|BORDERLINE PERSONALITY, OKAY?   
20110101011952.000|20110101011952.000|CC1|HOLD ON.                        
20110101011952.000|20110101011953.000|CC1|>> SHE'S NOT BEEN CLINICALLY    
20110101011953.000|20110101011956.000|CC1|DIAGNOSED.                      
20110101011956.000|20110101011959.000|CC1|>> BETHANY MARSHALL, BORDERLINE,
20110101011959.000|20110101012001.000|CC1|NOT CLINICALLY DIAGNOSED.       
20110101012001.000|20110101012002.000|CC1|SHE ISN'T CRAZY.                
20110101012002.000|20110101012004.000|CC1|SHE IS ANGRY OVER A DIVORCE AND 
20110101012004.000|20110101012006.000|CC1|SHE KILLED ONE OF HER CHILDREN, 
20110101012006.000|20110101012009.000|CC1|TRIED TO KILL THE OTHER ONE.    
20110101012009.000|20110101012011.000|CC1|>> THIS IS NOT JUST ABOUT       
20110101012011.000|20110101012013.000|CC1|BORDERLINE PERSONALITY DISORDER.
20110101012013.000|20110101012016.000|CC1|THIS IS A MOTHER WHO HATE, HATE,
20110101012016.000|20110101012017.000|CC1|HATED HER TWO CHILDREN.         
20110101012017.000|20110101012018.000|CC1|WHY?                            
20110101012018.000|20110101012019.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY'RE CUTE, BECAUSE   
20110101012019.000|20110101012020.000|CC1|THEY'RE LITTLE, BECAUSE THEY'RE
